languages.text: "Ты мне скажи". {n}Вы смотрите на Висиря, и его трясущаяся фигура кажется незначимой, маленькой. Стоит сделать лишь шаг — и вы раздавите его. Но видения понемногу рассеиваются, и вот уже старец возвышается над вами. Пристальный взгляд зашитых глаз изучает каждое ваше движение в ожидании ответа.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ты мне скажи". {n}Вы смотрите на Висиря, и его трясущаяся фигура кажется незначимой, маленькой. Стоит сделать лишь шаг — и вы раздавите его. Но видения понемногу рассеиваются, и вот уже старец возвышается над вами. Пристальный взгляд зашитых глаз изучает каждое ваше движение в ожидании ответа.{/n}

languages.text: "That is for you to tell me." {n}You look at the Vizsier, and his trembling frame seems small and insignificant. A single step is all it would take to crush him. But the visions are starting to wear off, and now the old man towers over you. The keen gaze of his sealed eyes is studying your every movement, waiting for a response.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ты мне скажи". {n}Вы смотрите на Висиря, и его трясущаяся фигура кажется незначимой, маленькой. Стоит сделать лишь шаг — и вы раздавите его. Но видения понемногу рассеиваются, и вот уже старец возвышается над вами. Пристальный взгляд зашитых глаз изучает каждое ваше движение в ожидании ответа.{/n}

But the visions are starting to wear off, and now the old man towers over you. The keen gaze of his sealed eyes is studying your every movement, waiting for a response.{/n}

"That is for you to tell me." {n}You look at the Vizsier, and his trembling figure seems small and insignificant. A single step is all it would take to crush him. But the intoxication is starting to wear off, and now the old man is towering over you. The keen gaze of his sewn-shut eyes is studying your every movement, waiting for a response.{/n}

But the visions are starting to wear off, and now the old man towers over you. The keen gaze of his sealed eyes is studying your every movement, waiting for a response.{/n}

languages.text: "Das müsst Ihr mir sagen." {n}Du blickst den Wesir an. Sein zitternder Körper wirkt klein und unbedeutend. Ein einziger Schritte würde ausreichen, um ihn zu zerquetschen. Doch die Visionen lassen langsam nach, und nun ragt der alte Mann imposant vor dir auf. Der scharfe Blick seiner versiegelten Augen beobachtet jede deiner Bewegungen, wartet auf eine Reaktion.{/n}
languages.original_text: "That is for you to tell me." {n}You look at the Vizsier, and his trembling frame seems small and insignificant. A single step is all it would take to crush him. But the visions are starting to wear off, and now the old man towers over you. The keen gaze of his sealed eyes is studying your every movement, waiting for a response.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Das müsst Ihr mir sagen." {n}Du blickst den Wesir an. Sein zitternder Körper wirkt klein und unbedeutend. Ein einziger Schritte würde ausreichen, um ihn zu zerquetschen. Doch der Rauschzustand lässt langsam nach, und nun ragt der alte Mann imposant vor dir auf. Der scharfe Blick seiner versiegelten Augen beobachtet jede deiner Bewegungen, wartet auf eine Reaktion.{/n}

languages.text: «Eso es algo que debe decirme usted». {n}Miras al Visir, y su cuerpo tembloroso parece pequeño e insignificante. Solo te costaría un paso aplastarlo. Pero las visiones empiezan a desaparecer, y ahora el anciano parece un gigante frente a ti. La mirada astuta de sus ojos sellados analiza cada uno de tus movimientos mientras espera tu respuesta.{/n}
languages.original_text: "That is for you to tell me." {n}You look at the Vizsier, and his trembling frame seems small and insignificant. A single step is all it would take to crush him. But the visions are starting to wear off, and now the old man towers over you. The keen gaze of his sealed eyes is studying your every movement, waiting for a response.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Eso es algo que debe decirme usted». {n}Miras al Visir, y su cuerpo tembloroso parece pequeño e insignificante. Solo te costaría un paso aplastarlo. Pero la embriaguez empieza a desaparecer, y ahora el anciano parece un gigante frente a ti. La mirada astuta de sus ojos sellados analiza cada uno de tus movimientos mientras espera tu respuesta.{/n}

languages.text: 「それはあなたが私に語るべきことだ」{n}あなたはヴィジールを見る。その震える体躯は小さく、取るに足りないものに思えた。一歩足を踏み出しさえすれば、彼を踏みつぶすことができるだろう。だが、その幻覚も醒めはじめ、今や老人はあなたを圧倒している。封じられた目の鋭い視線が、あなたの一挙手一投足を観察し、返事を待っている。{/n}
languages.original_text: "That is for you to tell me." {n}You look at the Vizsier, and his trembling frame seems small and insignificant. A single step is all it would take to crush him. But the visions are starting to wear off, and now the old man towers over you. The keen gaze of his sealed eyes is studying your every movement, waiting for a response.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「それはあなたが私に語るべきことだ」{n}あなたはヴィジールを見る。その震える体躯は小さく、取るに足りないものに思えた。一歩足を踏み出しさえすれば、彼を踏みつぶすことができるだろう。だが、その酩酊も醒めはじめ、今や老人はあなたを圧倒している。封じられた目の鋭い視線が、あなたの一挙手一投足を観察し、返事を待っている。{/n}

languages.text: “这就要由您来告诉我了。”{n}宿老就站在你眼前，他颤抖的身躯显得无比渺小，只要你往前迈出一步，就可以一脚把他碾死。然而，你眼前的幻景渐渐消退，宿老的身躯变得越发高大，被缝住的双眼敏锐地注视着你的一举一动，等待着你的回应。{/n}
languages.original_text: "That is for you to tell me." {n}You look at the Vizsier, and his trembling frame seems small and insignificant. A single step is all it would take to crush him. But the visions are starting to wear off, and now the old man towers over you. The keen gaze of his sealed eyes is studying your every movement, waiting for a response.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “这就要由您来告诉我了。”{n}你看着眼前的宿老，他颤抖的身躯显得无比渺小，只要你往前迈出一步，就可以一脚把他碾死。然而，你脑中的醉意开始消退。如今，那位老人高高地站在你面前，被缝住的双眼敏锐地注视着你的一举一动，等待着你的回应。{/n}

languages.text: « C'est à vous de me le dire. » {n}Vous regardez le vizir et réalisez à quel point sa vieille carcasse tremblante paraît petite et insignifiante. Un seul et unique pas suffirait à l'écraser, mais les visions commencent à se dissiper, et il vous surplombe à présent de tout son haut. Le regard perçant de ses yeux cousus suit vos moindres faits et gestes, guettant votre réaction.{/n}
languages.original_text: "That is for you to tell me." {n}You look at the Vizsier, and his trembling frame seems small and insignificant. A single step is all it would take to crush him. But the visions are starting to wear off, and now the old man towers over you. The keen gaze of his sealed eyes is studying your every movement, waiting for a response.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « C'est à vous de me le dire. » {n}Vous regardez le vizir et réalisez à quel point sa vieille carcasse tremblante paraît petite et insignifiante. Un seul et unique pas suffirait à l'écraser, mais les effets du poison commencent à se dissiper, et il vous surplombe à présent de tout son haut. Le regard perçant de ses yeux cousus suit vos moindres faits et gestes, guettant votre réaction.{/n}

languages.text: "Bunu bana söyleyecek sizsiniz." {n}Vezir'e bakıyorsun. Titreyen sureti, ufak ve önemsiz görünüyor. Onu ezip geçmek için tek bir adım atmak yeter de artar bile. Lakin görülerin etkisi geçmeye başlıyor. İhtiyar adım şimdi başında dikiliyor. Kapalı gözlerinin keskin bakışları, her bir hareketini inceleyerek bir tepki bekliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "That is for you to tell me." {n}You look at the Vizsier, and his trembling frame seems small and insignificant. A single step is all it would take to crush him. But the visions are starting to wear off, and now the old man towers over you. The keen gaze of his sealed eyes is studying your every movement, waiting for a response.{/n}
